classkit-tool(8) System Manager's Manual classkit-tool(8)

NAME

classkit-tool — ClassKit Tool

SYNOPSIS

classkit-tool -h | --help

classkit-tool -s | --show-devmode

classkit-tool -d | --devmode dev-mode

classkit-tool -r | --reset-devmode-data

DESCRIPTION

This tool allows you to test your ClassKit enabled app by putting this Mac into development mode, in the role of either teacher or student. You also set the value of the ClassKit entitlement of your application to development. For more information, see https://developer.apple.com/documentation/classkit.

The options are as follows:

-h | --help
Show this message and exit.
-s | --show-devmode
Return the current development mode.
-d | --devmode <off | teacher | student>
Set the development mode to off, teacher, or student
-r | --reset-devmode-data
Reset the development mode data.

HISTORY

The classkit-tool utility first appeared in macOS 11.

April 2, 2021 Mac OS X 12
